bug.author: keevinzha
bug.description:
Describe the bug have connected the pwnagotchi via bluetooth to my android phone, and the BT symbol has become C, when i try to login the 192.168.44.44:8080 with the passwd of pi user, I got passwd wrong and unauthorized To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
visit 192.168.44.44:8080 input username and passwd got wrong passwd
Expected behavior login successfully with my phone Environment (please complete the following information):
Pwnagotchi version v1.5.3 Android10 Huawei mate10
Additional context I wonder which passwd should I use or where can I change this passwd?

comments.comment: SSH into pi and then u are able to change the default password
